001.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, modest dress, standing in a quiet hall, poised expression, shoulders and head visible, soft lighting, viewed subtly from below, strong presence, looking slightly upward, hopeful expression, background blurred to focus sharply on eyes, emphasis on skin texture like silk, gentle lighting,
